wybug_title: 合生元某站存在漏洞导致上百万用户信息泄露
wybug_corp: 广州市合生元生物制品有限公司
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-05-02：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2013-06-16：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 某个部门的站点存在隐患，导致用户信息泄漏 详细说明：  
命令执行：http://mall.mama100.com/area.action网站物理路径： /opt/webapp/malljava.home: /usr/local/software/jdk1.6.0_34/jrejava.version: 1.6.0_34os.name: Linuxos.arch: amd64os.version: 2.6.32-220.el6.x86_64user.name: rootuser.home: /rootuser.dir: /usr/local/software/glassfish3122/glassfish3/glassfish/domains/mall-domain/configjava.class.version: 50.0java.class.path: /usr/local/software/glassfish3122/glassfish3/glassfish/modules/glassfish.jar:/usr/local/software/glassfish3122/glassfish3/glassfish/lib/monitor/flashlight-agent.jarjava.library.path: /usr/local/software/glassfish3122/glassfish3/glassfish/lib:/usr/local/software/jdk1.6.0_34/jre/lib/amd64/server:/usr/local/software/jdk1.6.0_34/jre/lib/amd64:/usr/local/software/jdk1.6.0_34/lib/amd64:/usr/java/packages/lib/amd64:/usr/lib64:/lib64:/lib:/usr/lib
   漏洞证明：  

1660158用户数据~
